snippet.title: Trailer 2 - NSMB2: Mushroom Madness
snippet.description:
This is the Teaser Trailer that was seen in Rimea's "New Super Mario Bros. Franchise Modding Direct 2023" on July 14th.

New Super Mario Bros. 2: Mushroom Madness is a small modification of New Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Nintendo 3DS. It features 1 and a half worlds of brand-new mushroom-themed levels exploring some fresh environments and interesting mechanics that haven't been seen before.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It's been way too long since I first started this mod and uploaded the Reveal Trailer. But now, finally, a Release date is set and hopefully everything will be done until September 30th. I apologize for taking such a long time, even if I'm doing everything (that's not made by Nintendo already) by myself, it really shouldn't have taken this long. 

Trailer edited and Gameplay captured by myself.
Music : Mario Kart 8 Deluxe OST - Shroom Ridge
